description: Post-Katrina damage assessment conducted by City inspectors, published by address with breakdown by category. These data formerly supported the "Damage Assessment Wizard" web tool. Also see attachment 'DA_Categories' for insight as to how damage was assessed.

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans – Office of Information Technology & Innovation, Enterprise Information Team

name: Post-Katrina Damage Assessment
